job.title: Backend/Big Data Software Engineer - Tech Lead
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brThe backendbig data technical lead will work in a small and dynamic team to design and implement applications and infrastructure for RampD of deep learningcomputer vision Apple productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br4 years of SW development experience including SW architecture design reliability and performance brbrProven objectoriented fundamentals and design patternsbrbrProficiency in Python andor C brbrExperience with SQL andor NOSQLbrbrProven experience with writing both front and backends for Web Applications is requiredbrbrProven experience with HTML and Java Script is requiredbrbrAble to communicate clearly and collaborate with crossfunctional teamsbrbrAble to lead a project with minimal guidancebrbrExcellent problem solving and root cause analysis skillsbrbrbr Exposure to algorithms AIML or data science projects including evaluating algorithms on datasetsbrbr Exposure to data generation and analysesbrbr Exposure to Computer Vision Tracking systemsbrbr Experience with a different frameworksservices such as S3 Kubernetes Docker Kafka Spark Redis TerraForm Ansiblebrbr Experience with developing scalable systemsbrbr  Experience with pipelines processing huge data volumebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brYou will design and implement scalable solutions terabytes of data multiple thousands of CPUs which will affect all the stages of the computer visiondeep learning algorithms development including data generation models training and failure analyses You will work together with algorithm data and software engineers to productize and optimize computer vision products which will be used by millions of Apple customersbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMasterss degree or higher in Computer Science or equivalent fieldbrbr brRole Number 200285218brbr
